<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>NLQ - Adding FQ synonyms to sys_choice table for incident and task tables</description>
        <name>NLQ - Adding FQ synonyms to Choice table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[		choicesSynonyms = [
			{
				'name': 'task',
				'element': 'priority',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '1',
				'synonyms': 'critiques,critique,p1,p1s,p1\'s'
			},
			{
				'name': 'task',
				'element': 'priority',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '2',
				'synonyms': 'p2,p2s,p2\'s,hautement,élevée,à fort,important,haute'
			},
			{
				'name': 'task',
				'element': 'priority',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '3',
				'synonyms': 'p3,p3s,p3\'s'
			},
			{
				'name': 'task',
				'element': 'priority',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '4',
				'synonyms': 'p4,p4s,p4\'s'
			},
			{
				'name': 'task',
				'element': 'priority',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '5',
				'synonyms': 'p5,p5s,p5\'s'
			},
			{
				'name': 'incident',
				'element': 'state',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '1',
				'synonyms': 'nouveaux'
			},
			{
				'name': 'incident',
				'element': 'state',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '2',
				'synonyms': 'en cours de traitement'
			},
			{
				'name': 'incident',
				'element': 'state',
				'language': 'fq',
				'value': '3',
				'synonyms': 'en attente'
			}
		];


		choicesSynonyms.forEach(function (choiceSynonyms) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
			gr.addQuery("name", choiceSynonyms.name);
			gr.addQuery("element", choiceSynonyms.element);
			gr.addQuery("language", choiceSynonyms.language);
			gr.addQuery("value", choiceSynonyms.value);
			gr.query();
			if (gr.next()) {
				gr.setValue('synonyms', choiceSynonyms.synonyms);
				gr.update();
			}
		});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
